verses.roman:
tā nirāśā nivavṛtur
govinda-vinivartane
viśokā ahanī ninyur
gāyantyaḥ priya-ceṣṭitam

synonyms: tāḥ—they; nirāśāḥ—without hope; nivavṛtuḥ—turned back; govinda-vinivartane—of Govinda's returning; viśokāḥ—extremely sorrowful; ahanī—the days and nights; ninyuḥ—they spent; gāyantyaḥ—chanting; priya—of their beloved; ceṣṭitam—about the activities.
translation: The gopīs then turned back, without hope that Govinda would ever return to them. Full of sorrow, they began to spend their days and nights chanting about the pastimes of their beloved.
